name: From The Trees
description:
This game was made for the Australian Bushfire Charity Jam.

You are Alanna, an intrepid tourist and Australia's newest arrival. One of the locals has given you a pamphlet warning you of the dangerous and carnivorous drop bear. Dismissing it as nonsense, you decide to explore the nearest forest you can find, unaware that you're about to learn a painful lesson.

Controls (menu):

X button: X key

O button: Z key

Controls (in-game):

Move with the left and right arrow keys.
